<Text: Mark Z. Danielewski:  Though his second novel, "Only Revolutions" (2006), was nominated for the National Book Award, Danielewski is most widely known for his debut novel "House of Leaves" (2000), which garnered a considerable cult following and won the New York Public Library's Young Lions Fiction Award.>
